texto: for Resale,2021-05-17.09:27:29 UTC ISO 9004:2018(E) ﻿ The criteria given for the higher levels can help the organization to understand the issues it needs to consider and to determine the improvements needed to reach higher levels of maturity. Tables A.2 to A.32 give self-assessment criteria based on this document.
